name: Ritu Raj
desc: A passionate software developer. Explore my projects, skills, and experiences to see how I can help bring your ideas to life. Thank you for visiting!
aboutDesc: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm an innovative and dedicated software engineer with a passion for crafting elegant solutions to complex problems. With a foundation in computer science, I take pride in creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications that make a positive impact. I am a curious and driven individual who constantly seeks to expand my skill set and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends. My journey in the world of software began with a fascination for coding and problem-solving. Over the years, this passion has grown into a full-fledged career, enabling me to work on a diverse range of projects and technologies.
